phrases: They are all working very hard.
This is the inside of a human body.
We are the invincible T Cells!
There is nothing in this world that we fear!
We are the invincible T Cells!
Step on it, you slowass scrubs!
There is nothing in this world that we fear!
KILLER T CELLS (CYTOTOXIC T CELLS): Mobilize under orders from the Helper T Cells.
Assassins who recognize and destroy foreign cells, such as Graft Cells, virus-infected cells and Cancer Cells.
Mobilize under orders from the Helper T Cells.
Assassins who recognize and destroy foreign cells, such as Graft Cells,
We are the invincible T Cells!
Next up, some hellish resistance training and combat practice!
Look dammit, I cannot hear you!
You call yourselves T Cells, you miserable losers?
Not one of you even has a spine?
You think you can phone it in if you are a T Cell?
Loser scrubs like you are not fit to be T Cells!
You do know that as T Cells,
you are the immune system's last line of defense?
What good is a weak last line of defense?
Get yourselves in shape, you morons!
I am going to close the window, all right?
Even in here, we can still hear him hollering.
HELPER T CELLS: When notified of invading external enemies, they serve as commanders who formulate appropriate attack strategies, and they issue orders to Killer T Cells.
When notified of invading external enemies, they serve as commanders who formulate
appropriate attack strategies, and they issue orders to Killer T Cells.
Talk about ruining tea-time, huh, Regulatory T Cell?
REGULATORY T CELLS: They prevent Killer T Cells from spinning out of control, and suppress excessive immune abnormalities.
They prevent Killer T Cells from spinning out of control,
Looks like I hurled him too hard.
He took out the Helper T Commander!
I have been meaning to say this for some time!
Would it kill you to play it a little cool?
You have never been one to think about efficiency, have you now?
I have got a job to do, you know.
I need to make sure these guys can attack like they should on your orders.
Who is going to get jammed up if all we have are wimpy combatants?
Which is why I am telling you to rethink your methods!
Do not just send them flying like that!
You are as heavy-handed as ever!
The most crucial thing about drills is to strengthen their hearts!
How can they learn to get tougher if I train them softly?
You know what, you have never had a clue about planning things out!
Yeah, and all you do is drone on and on!
Who are they to each other, exactly?
I am the one who knows what it is like on the front lines!
Are not they boss and subordinate?
I do not drone on and on!
DENDRITIC CELLS: Their role is to present bacteria that have invaded the body, and fragments of viral infection cells as antigens, and to notify other immune system cells.
They are also involved in nurturing T Cells.
Their role is to present bacteria that have invaded the body,
and fragments of viral infection cells as antigens,
and to notify other immune system cells.
They are also involved in nurturing T Cells.
They were classmates back in Thymus School.
He is the Helper T Commander?
Killer T Senpai is so scrawny!
My job happens to involve using my brain!
He is getting his butt kicked!
He is nothing like he is today!
I envy you for having the mindless job of just drilling them!
Looks that way, does not it?
THYMUS: The lymphoid organ that categorizes and fosters precursor cells into full-fledged T Cells.
There is nothing in this world that we fear!
This thymus is where we are going to separate the useful from the useless!
We are the apprentice T Cells!
And we are going to kill any virus or germ!
We are the apprentice T Cells!
There is nothing in this world that we fear!
We are the apprentice T Cells!
And we are going to kill any virus or germ!
starting today, I am going to train you really hard, so brace yourselves!
THYMIC EPITHELIAL CELL: The Epithelial Cells that form the thymus.
They nurture Lymphatic Cells, aiding in T Cell categorization.
The Epithelial Cells that form the thymus.
They nurture Lymphatic Cells, aiding in T Cell categorization.
You guys will be taking a test now!
A test to see if you can react to an external enemy antigen, got that?
You will see human-type panels appear out of the blue!
Judge for yourselves which ones you think are antigens, and attack!
Those who mistakenly assault common cells,
those who fail to attack a single antigen before they reach the goal,
will be disqualified on the spot!
Only two to three percent will still be standing at the end!
C-Could it be an antigen panel?
He split the panel into two!
I went after that panel first!
And how could you stomp on my head?
That was me using you as a springboard.
Because that was the shortest route to the panel.
But you have got to have better reaction time,
or it is going to be hard to become a great T Cell, you know.
Would you mind not making me expend unnecessary energy?
D-Did it really hurt that much, that poke to the forehead?
Getting involved with that one would be wasted effort!
Such a glaring talent gap in this crop of candidates...
Who would have thought we would end up rooming together?
So the room assignments are not based on merit.
Wh-What is that supposed to mean?
Do not make me spell everything out for you.
As for the bunk bed, I am taking the bottom bunk.
You are letting me have the top one?
Because it is a waste of time to climb up and down.
But in return, make sure you keep your climbing to the minimum.
Otherwise, I will not be able to get a full night's rest.
I mean, you might as well sleep on the floor.
Is that any way to treat someone?
Is force the only thing you understand?
You two sure have a lot of time on your hands.
I just happened to be walking by.
I thought you were deliberately creating a problem because you wanted to drop out.
Why would I want to do that?
Seems like the two in the bed across from you flunked out after today.
I would better get my game on, too.
The hellish training sessions continued after that day.
Somehow, they managed to get through it
Hey, do not be so stubborn.
It is going to end the same anyway!
You are not cut out to be T Cell.
Only the top achievers in this class can hope to survive.
Everyone who is finished, head back to the dorm!
I am laying my life on the line here, and you are always sipping tea!
You want another poke to the forehead?
I think I will call it a night.
Wh-What the heck is he doing?
Killer T punch! 42 in a row!
He is got to be wiped out after today's drills.
Jeez, what does he mean, Secret Art?
It has nothing to do with me.
Now that is what you call youth!
You are interested in those two, as well?
Now if the fists started flying, it would make it even more like a teen movie.
I hope those two end up surviving, do not you?
There is nothing in this world that we fear!
And we are going to kill...
Today, there is going to be a special surprise test!
Do not flinch like that, you idiots!
There is no advance warning when an external enemy shows up!
Those of you who lack sufficient training
You guys will be taking a test called Positive Selection!
The rules are the same as always!
POSITIVE SELECTION/NEGATIVE SELECTION: Positive Selection (selecting useful T Cells for survival) and Negative Selection (eliminating harmful, self-destructive T Cells) occur in the thymus.
Through this process, the Lymphocytes that can precisely distinguish between self and non-self proteins, such as pathogens are selected.
Ultimately, only a few percent of these cells can become T Cells.
All you need to do is assault the antigen panels until time's up!
But almost all of you will be weeded out today!
You just need to carry on as usual!
I just need to carry on as usual, right?
That is a panel of a common cell holding a pickling stone!
This is not the same as usual!
I thought it was a virus, but it was just a fancy hat!
So, it looks like this test is more difficult than usual.
No, this is a common cell wearing a disaster hood!
So, now, it is my turn, huh?
Whenever you attack, you have a habit of unconsciously closing your eyes.
So, no wonder you cannot land a punch.
When you are attacking your target, keep your eyes on it until the end!
I-I am so nervous, I am starting to feel sick!
Whenever you attack, you have a habit of unconsciously closing your eyes.
This is a common cell holding a pincushion!
So you did not fall for it!
There is not much time left!
You are running out of time!
Ultimate Internal Secret Art Antigen-bludgeoning Pulverizing Fist!
How come you know about that?
To be honest, I have no confidence
in being able to carry on as a T Cell.
you could be a Helper or a Regulatory T Cell, not just a Killer T Cell, right?
If you are going to be like that,
it is not too late to tell them you are going to drop out.
Then, why do not you quit?
people will not humor you when you have these stupid maudlin moments,
No, the working world is not such an easy place!
does not know jack about how I feel!
If you have looked your own weakness in the eye,
then, deal with reality for once!
You have no choice but to keep giving it your all!
Even if your efforts seem wasted,
your redeeming quality is how you keep grinding away on your own, is not it?
You will not hear me whine again!
I am going to get stronger.
I am going to train until I can take out any enemy with one blow!
I am going to build up my muscles like there is no tomorrow, and give it my all!
Now I know what it is that I should strive for myself.
I can see that inefficient bumblers like you need someone to issue them orders.
If you are going to become a commander, you need to loosen up a little,
or your subordinates will freak out.
You do not have to tell me.
I am well aware of that!
I just need to loosen up, right?
So, you see, that is what happened.
We are laying our lives on the line here, and you are always sipping tea!
Well, that is because deskwork is so grueling!
Do you have to nag like that?
So that is how those two came to be like that?
What have you guys been looking at anyway?
Hey, what do you think you are doing?
Just burn those photos up please!
Seriously, those two are so ridiculous.
They are just the same as they were back then.
It is the person in the mask!
Next episode of Cells at Work!,
He is asking you to please watch.
I think he is asking you to please watch!
